list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?vcard ?email ?emailAddress WHERE { ?subject ?property ?vcard . ?vcard vcard:hasEmail ?email . ?email vcard:email ?emailAddress . MINUS { ?subject ?property ?vcard . ?vcard vcard:hasEmail ?email . ?email a vcard:Work . } }
